mapper.select: SELECT cheq_num, cheq_name, cheq_rate, cheq_type, cheq_target, cheq_regDate, cheq_limit, cheq_period FROM cheqproduct_tbl ORDER BY cheq_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cheqproduct_tbl(cheq_num, cheq_name, cheq_rate, cheq_type, cheq_target, cheq_limit, cheq_period) VALUES(cheqPro_seq.nextval, #{cheq_name}, #{cheq_rate}, #{cheq_type}, #{cheq_target}, #{cheq_limit}, #{cheq_period})

INSERT INTO savProduct_tbl(sav_num, sav_name , sav_limit , sav_period , sav_target, sav_rate, sav_period, sav_autotrans) VALUES(savPro_seq.nextval, #{sav_name}, #{sav_limit}, #{sav_period}, #{sav_target}, #{sav_rate}, #{sav_period}, #{sav_autotrans})
INSERT INTO myCheqAccount_tbl(myCheq_account, myCheq_pwd ,cheq_num, c_id) VALUES(#{account}, #{pwd}, #{num}, #{id})
INSERT INTO mySavAccount_tbl(mySav_account, mySav_account, sav_num, c_id) VALUES(#{account}, #{pwd}, #{num}, #{id})
